entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Témiscamingue
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.8°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
